segments.text: Hi . Are you new in this class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I really don ’ t know anyone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you just arrive in this country ? You look a little nervous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I was here last semester , but I didn ’ t find out about this class in time . So I ’ m taking it this semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took this course last semester too . Now I am taking it again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How is it ? Did you learn anything here ? Why are you taking it again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , you have a lot of questions ! I learned a lot . In fact , that ’ s why I am taking it again . I get lots of practice in speaking , and also in writing . I ’ m sure you ’ ll be glad you took this course . I ’ ll even help you study if you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s just what I need . Thanks so much . You ’ Ve been a big help already .
segments.speaker: S2
